instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Ensure 'Manrope', 'IBM Plex Sans', and 'JetBrains Mono' are imported in index.css via Google Fonts.
2. THEME: Enforce DARK MODE by default. Add 'dark' class to the html or body tag immediately.
3. LAYOUT: Use the 'Control Room' grid strategy. Dense, information-rich, but with clear hierarchy.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to match the 'Control Room' aesthetic. Remove excessive rounding (max rounded-lg). Use thin borders (1px) with low opacity.
5. CHARTS: Use Recharts. Style tooltips with the 'glassmorphism' class defined in visual_enhancers. Ensure grid lines are very subtle (stroke='#333').
6. DATA: Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all numerical data, transaction IDs, and code snippets.
7. INTERACTIVITY: Add hover states to all table rows and cards. Use subtle border color changes (border-primary/50) to indicate focus.
8. MOCK DATA: Generate realistic banking data (transactions, fraud scores, customer segments) to populate the dashboard.
9. CLOUD DETECTION: Create a dedicated status widget in the header or sidebar that pulses green (Active) or red (Issue).
10. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background. Use the defined palette colors.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
